attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they are dangerous the impact zone on a 4x4 is at a diferent level to that of a normal car therefore making crashes more fatal. They use up more petrol which is bad for the eco system.They are vehicles designed to be driven off road so why do average people need them?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
